input_text.Prompt:
Given a product specification and product keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Product specification:
MLB Philadelphia Phillies Delay Of Game Ath Red/Athletic Gray Marled Long Sleeve Mock Nck Synthetic Frntry Fzip

Product keywords:
Cotton 94%/Organic Cotton 6%
Long Sleeve Mock Neck Synthetic French Teery Full-Zip
Woven Label
Self-Fabric Applique.
Egypt
input_text.Response A: Ooh! Ooh! Look at this cool shirt! 😍 It's for the Philadelphia Phillies, and it's so soft and comfy! 🥰 It's made of cotton, but not just any cotton - it's organic cotton, so it's good for the environment! 🌿 And it has a fun mock neck and long sleeves, so you can stay warm and stylish! 💁‍♀️ The best part? It has a cool full-zip and a woven label, so you can show off your team spirit! 👍 Plus, it's made in Egypt, so you know it's high quality! 🇪🇹 So, do you want this awesome shirt? 🤔
input_text.Response B: The Philadelphia Phillies Delay Of Game Ath Red/Athletic Gray Marled Long Sleeve Mock Nck Synthetic Frntry Fzip is a unique and innovative product, utilizing cutting-edge synthetic fabric technology to provide superior comfort and performance.  This exciting new product features a mock neck design with full-zip closure, providing a sleek, modern look while ensuring optimal fit and comfort.  The high-quality synthetic fabric offers superior moisture wicking properties, keeping the wearer dry and comfortable even during the most intense workouts or activities.  Additionally, the stylish marled design and eye-catching team colors make this product ideal for showing team spirit and enhancing any athletic wardrobe.  The Phillies DOG Ath is truly a top-quality product that is sure to please even the most discerning consumer.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.

label_annotations.factors_a: Response A seemed more engaging and almost conversational-like, which helped when reading. It didn't feel overbearing or full of info-dumping.
label_annotations.factors_b: It felt like a large wall of text, somewhat suffocating to read and take the information in.
